rooms.description: Large open-plan space incorporating Bohemian style with vibrant colors and eclectic decor. It serves as the entrance hall and living area, seamlessly blending into a multi-functional lounge that supports joint family gatherings.

Modern kitchen integrated with dining space offering functional design and ample storage. Features an open-plan layout with vibrant Bohemian accents in backsplash tiles and decor elements. Adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the cooking area towards the east.
Cozy guest bedroom designed for joint family members or visitors. Bohemian style with a mix of vintage furniture and artisanal decor.
Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, incorporating serene Bohemian motifs and natural lighting. Vastu-compliant orientation with the bed facing north.
Designated study area that doubles as a workspace. Minimalistic yet bohemian decor to inspire creativity while ensuring privacy.
Small utility space for cleaning supplies and additional storage needs. Designed with practical functionality in mind.
